title: Coinbase Surges as Dip Buyers Bet on Crypto Market Bottom
description: Coinbase Global Inc. ripped almost 20% higher on more than double-average trading volume, just a day after posting weak results, a sign that investors had already braced for worse.
content: Coinbase Global Inc. ripped almost 20% higher on more than double-average trading volume, just a day after posting weak results, a sign that investors had already braced for worse.
